Pines, pine savahnah (long-leaf), upland forest, FORAGING: wetalnd forests, open swamps and marshes, streams. NOT HABITAT: Non-forested everglades, upland scrub oak, upland closed canopy pines. VARIABLES: patchiness of wetlands in forest.
